resources.string: Get a quick view of your account
View your current balance, available credit and Cashback Bonus balance at anytime with just a quick tap or swipe of your finger.
View your current balance, available credit and Miles balance at anytime with just a quick tap or swipe of your finger.
View your current balance, available credit at anytime with just a quick tap or swipe of your finger.
Go to Profile and Settings to enable.
Manage your bank accounts on the go
You can now add, edit and remove your bank acounts straight from your Discover Mobile app.
Get into the app faster with Passcode
Set up a 4-digt Passcode to access your account information, instead of using your User ID and Password
Go to Profile and Settings to enable.
An upgraded way to manage payments
Now you can edit and cancel pending payments directly from your Discover Mobile app.
